employeesList.name: Mr. Plop
employeesList.desc: Puddleplop's dad! Used to own the cafe, but needs some help now that he's older.

employeesList.name: Toofy
employeesList.desc: A hard and precise worker, albeit a bit awkward and shy at times.

employeesList.name: Lilypad
employeesList.desc: A childhood friend of Puddleplop's. Sociable and fast, but a bit clumsy.
